string.value: I better talk to #b#p1101002##k and get some information on Monster Mounts for Knights.
#p1101002# told me I'll need to visit #b#p1102002# the Mount Trainer#k, who's at the #bHatchery#k raising the Mimis for Mounts.
I met with #p1102002# the Mount Trainer.

Oh you made it here. Let's cut to the chase. There's a Mount that's different from all other Monster Mounts available only to the Cygnus Knights. Unlike the regular Monster Mounts, this Mount uses Mimi.

Go to the #bHatchery#k that follows Training Forest 3, and you'll find #b#p1102002# the Mount Trainer#k raising the Mimis for Mounts. Go up to him and learn the intricacies of Mounts for Knights. Of course, this is for the glory of the Empress.
I have just written you a letter of introduction. Show him the letter, and #p1102002# will teach you about Mounting. Hopefully the next time I see you, you'll be riding one of those.
Hmm... do you honestly wish to keep moving from place to place with just your legs?
Hmm? You must be a newly-minted Knight here. Are you here to learn how to Mount?
Psssh, #p1101002#. He doesn't need to write this letter, since it's obvious whoever's coming to me is probably from #m130000000# anyway.

Have you yet to go on to #b#p1102002##k yet? Then let's pick up the pace now. It's not like #m130000000# is a huge island that is a tough to navigate. Don't tell me you can't find the #bMimi Hatchery#k. Really?

Hmmm..., I do know that you're a Cygnus Knight, but... without #b#t4032115##k... I can't do it for you. We need to keep a standard of formality in here, and I can't process this until you bring me the letter again.
